content.en: Gamma Camera Innovations: Scientists have been exploring various ways to improve the performance and efficiency of gamma cameras used in medical imaging. They have been using algorithms to evaluate the imaging performance of different camera technologies, such as scintillator-based and semiconductor-based cameras. Additionally, algorithms have been developed to enhance the quality of imaging and efficiency of radiation detection in compact hybrid gamma cameras. These advancements aim to provide better imaging capabilities and improve the detection of radioactive materials.
content.da: Gamma-kamera-innovationer: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige måder at forbedre ydeevnen og effektiviteten af gamma-kameraer, der anvendes i medicinsk billeddannelse. De har brugt algoritmer til at evaluere billeddannelsesydelsen af forskellige kamerateknologier, såsom scintillator-baserede og halvleder-baserede kameraer. Derudover er der udviklet algoritmer til at forbedre kvaliteten af billeddannelsen og effektiviteten af stråledetektion i kompakte hybride gamma-kameraer. Disse fremskridt sigter mod at give bedre billeddannelsesmuligheder og forbedre detektion af radioaktive materialer.
